sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: The place that Will decided to take Anna that day was nothing special to anyone else but them.

sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: It was just a free garden in the city, but it was the place where Will finally got the courage to ask Anna to be his girlfriend a long time ago.

sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: They were very close since they were little but Will finally voiced his feelings to Anna in this very garden.

sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: At this place, there’s this one tree. The tree is not that unique. It’s just one simple aspen tree.

sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: It’s gold, majestically amplifies the sunshine, and of course, beautiful. But that’s just like any other aspen tree.

sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: And there are many of them around this park. But this one, at least for Will, and Anna, is the most precious.
